title: Searching for Young portrait and Cobb bat on / off
author: KYcollector

posts.post_title: Searching for Young portrait and Cobb bat on / off
posts.post_content:
Looking for the cards in the title, probably just like everyone else. New to collecting T206 and selling off post war stuff. I’m almost out of stuff to sell so I want to add something significant. Prefer low grade PSA but open to SGC as well.

Thanks
